Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.message.ctosmessage

Class LeadersChoiceMessage

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.message.Message
it.polimi.ingsw.network.message.ctosmessage.CtoSMessage
it.polimi.ingsw.network.message.ctosmessage.LeadersChoiceMessage
public class LeadersChoiceMessage extends CtoSMessage
This class implements a message from the client to chose the starting leaders Message structure: { nickname, leaders' Id }
